EmailTemplate.description: TFS Contact Us - Web-to-Case - Careers Auto-response
EmailTemplate.name: TFS: Contact Us - Careers (Unauthenticated)
EmailTemplate.subject: Toyota Financial Services - Contact Us Confirmation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.SuppliedName}:
Thank you for contacting Toyota Financial Services via the 'Contact Us' link at www.ToyotaFinancial.com.
Messages sent through this channel are unsecure. As we value your privacy, we will not provide account-specific information through this unsecured channel.
For more information please go to www.ToyotaFinancial.com and select 'About Us' at the top of the web page. Then select 'Careers' for more information about current career opportunities at Toyota Financial Services.
Thank you for visiting us at www.ToyotaFinancial.com.
Sincerely, Toyota Financial Services Customer Support
This is a no reply email notification. Replies initiated from this email will neither be delivered nor answered. If you have additional questions, please log in to the Support Center for further assistance.
